publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8026 John Wilson: Youth Health Day @ Chryston Success—That the Parliament congratulates Chryston High School on the success of its recent Youth Health Day @ Chryston event, held on 26 February 2011, to encourage healthy living for young people; applauds the hard work that it considers was put in by the event organisers and all who assisted in making the day such a success; notes that this event was supported and funded by NHS Lanarkshire and the Northern Corridor Community Forum, and acknowledges the widespread support from the people who turned out for the event, local groups, local health-related agencies and children and families from the local communities in the northern corridor.
S3M-8026 Youth Health Day @ Chryston Success (lodged on 28 February 2011) Jamie Hepburn*, Bill Kidd*, Christina McKelvie*, Margaret Mitchell*, Jackie Baillie*, Robin Harper*, Bob Doris*
S3M-8026 Youth Health Day @ Chryston Success (lodged on 28 February 2011) Stuart McMillan*, Gil Paterson*

S3M-8026 John Wilson: Youth Health Day @ Chryston Success—That the Parliament congratulates Chryston High School on the success of its recent Youth Health Day @ Chryston event, held on 26 February 2011, to encourage healthy living for young people; applauds the hard work that it considers was put in by the event organisers and all who assisted in making the day such a success; notes that this event was supported and funded by NHS Lanarkshire and the Northern Corridor Community Forum, and acknowledges the widespread support from the people who turned out for the event, local groups, local health-related agencies and children and families from the local communities in the northern corridor. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Bill Kidd, Christina McKelvie, Margaret Mitchell, Jackie Baillie, Robin Harper, Bob Doris, Stuart McMillan, Gil Paterson
S3M-8026 Youth Health Day @ Chryston Success (lodged on 28 February 2011) Linda Fabiani*
